mapper.select: SELECT sum(CASE when m.menu_name = '提交' then 1 else 0 end) "isSubmit" ,sum(CASE when m.menu_name = '审核' then 1 else 0 end) "isShenhe" from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE m.pid = #{menuId} and ur.user_id = #{userId}
